1.title: Hell Yes To The Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: The sister of NBA star, Stephen Curry, hunts for her dream wedding dress; Cami Lee returns with her over-the-top mom in search of the perfect black dress.

2.title: A Purple Unicorn

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Rock star and former bass player for Prince, bride Nik needs a one-of-a-kind dress for her aerial wedding ceremony; Teddi's wedding is only a few months away and she wonders if her dress will be ready in time.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Designer Hayley Page drops in to help a bride who wants to look like a creepy fairy to match her skull centerpieces on her wedding day; with over 150 discarded dresses, Rachael is a bride with a penchant for pickiness.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Superfan TK brings seven very feisty ladies with very different opinions to help her choose the "it" dress; actress Leslie has an unlimited budget but refuses to believe her opinionated mom chose the perfect wedding gown on the very first try.

6.title: Don't Show the Goodies

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Stephanie has a big budget and wants a show-stopper dress for her second marriage; Courtney Burson is back and she may have finally made up her mind about a dress.

7.title: The WAG

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Bride Lyndzie believes she was royalty in a past life and intends to have a royal wedding in this life; bride Ashley wants a dress that's not too revealing so her mom won't have a heart attack.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Sabrina Bryan of The Cheetah Girls has a dress-shopping date with designer Hayley Paige; one of Kleinfeld's own consultants is going to be a bride herself.

9.title: Not With Those Chubby Arms

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Angelica is looking for the perfect strapless gown, but her mom things her arms are too chubby to be seen; Tiffany and her crew of gospel singers are preparing for her holy matrimony, but may not since praises to the same dresses.

10.title: Bionic Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Crystal and her sisters have some severe sibling rivalry that she must rise above to find the perfect dress; Rebekah is known as the bionic model because of her prosthetic arm, and Randy makes it his mission to find her a dress.

1.title: Here Comes the Bridal Salon/Three Times a Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: An Introduction to the busiest bridal salon in New York. Brides come in to hopefully find "the one" dress that was meant for them.

2.title: Rocking the Dress/I Do or I Don't

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: A lot of brides have a lot of fun shopping for that perfect wedding dress. They enjoy every moment playing dress up and taking in childhood fantasies. But as we find out finding that perfect dress may be harder the finding the perfect mate.

3.title: That's Not My Dress/Bridal Breakdown

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Stacey is a girl who usually gets what she wants-but the dress she's dreaming about is on another bride. Keasha tries to convince the other bride's consultant to share the dress. Claudia has a bride in from Slovakia with a tight budget.

4.title: Lucky in Love/Wedding Dress Blues

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Consultant Claudia returns to work after a two week vacation, as she tries her best to get back into the swing of things at the salon. Nitsa, the Alteration Director is kept constantly on the go with lots of fittings.

5.title: To Buy or Not to Buy/What a Girl Wants

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Jessica has her hands full because Bride Kasey has obsessive compulsive disorder which can be debilitating for her decision making. Jackie's dress must be able to mask self tanner. Angela has arrived in alterations with second thoughts.

6.title: Italian Dressing/Here Comes the Groom

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: It's one of those days at the salon where everything seems to be going wrong. Wrong color, wrong dress, wrong size... the tension amps up, and its up to the managers to make things right. But tensions can run too high when an out of control mother of the bride punches alterations manager Vera. As if that weren't enough, sales manager Joan has to deal with a wedding planner from hell who is making one bride's dream dress selection a nightmare.

1.title: Here Comes the Bride Again... and Again

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: The Kleinfeld bridal salon can get over a hundred appointments a day making it important to keep things running. Sometimes some brides, like Angelina Zito, love visiting so much they come even when they don't have an appointment.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Keasha helps bride Lyerly Spongberg choose a dress for her second wedding. Joining her are her two young daughters and two soon-to-be teen stepdaughters. To make it a family experience, Lyerly tries to please all her daughters by trying on many dresses.

3.title: Mother Knows Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Even after gaining confidence from losing 100 pounds, Victoria still needs her mother's approval on her dress. Lauren and her mother don't have the same taste in bridal wear. At her fitting, a slimmer Vicki has to contend with her picky mom.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Brandon Michaels stars in Say Yes To The Dress with a role he isn't exactly used to playing. Can he pull off the perfect son image? Can he satisfy both his family and his mentors?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: A Bride to be travels with her family from California to NYC to find the dress of her dreams. Her father and her are not on the same page on what they like.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Every day is different at the bridal salon; sometimes there are one hundred appointments and sometimes fifty. And while it's shaping up to be a slow day at the salon that does not mean it is going to be an easy one. When there are fewer appointments, Kleinfeld accepts walk-ins and you never know who might show up. Every bride poses a unique challenge and can certainly fill a slow day. Bride-to-be Janice is a motorcycle enthusiast who never thought she would get married. But after meeting the man of her dreams online, she has changed her outlook. Janice's fiancé, ...

9.plot: No grooms actually try on any gowns, but they do have their hands in the choosing! One groom enjoys his bride's cleavage; another exerts a tremendous amount of influence; and a third groom destroys one bride's dream by breaking the engagement.

10.plot: Brides begin their wedding dress search either knowing exactly what they want or having no idea whatsoever. For Kimberly Gindi, her perfect dress doesn't exist so she decides to custom design it herself with designer, Pnina Tornai, by her side. But Kimberly soon finds out that an idea in your head doesn't always translate well in reality. Unhappy with the way her custom dress turns out, the salon worries the bride will walk away from the dress, leaving them with a custom gown nobody wants. Fortunately, Kimberly is able to find another dress that she is happy with, at ...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

18.plot: It's one of those days at the salon where everything seems to be going wrong. The tension amps up, and its up to the managers to make things right. But tensions can run too high when an out of control mother of the bride punches alterations manager Vera.

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

Dana is daddy's little girl so who else could she bring dress shopping with her, but her father? While Dana has a hard time choosing a dress, her dad is having a hard time "letting her go." It's time for the big blowout sale at the salon, where hundreds of ...

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

1.title: Overbooked

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

And Lindsay is in for a fitting, which goes more or less smoothly. That's more than one can say for her wedding where her twin sister steps on her wedding dress and tears it minutes before Lindsay is supposed to walk down the isle.

And downstairs two fittings go wrong: Jessica's veil comes in the wrong color and Gladys finds that she hates the lace on her all-lace gown.

5.title: Coco is Not Impessed

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Doga instructor Mariah looks for a princess dress and wants dog, Coco, to match; Jami is eloping to Paris and needs a dress as magical as her destination.

6.title: Launching a New Marriage

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Dress shopping just got hot with Iron Chef's Cat Cora and her fiance Nicole. But to keep things spicy the girls want to hide their final looks from one another with blindfolds! Rain needs a dress that will fit inside one of Coney Island's scariest rides!

7.title: There's a Shark in the Salon

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: It's sink or swim for Randy when Shark Tank's Barbara Corcoran comes to Kleinfeld! Bride Bridgette needs a dress she can RUN in...Her wedding ceremony is taking place during a half marathon in Las Vegas!

8.title: I'm the Bride, Leave Some Space

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Fashion-forward Nikki is looking for a fun, party-ready dress for her wild New Year's Eve wedding. Bride Natalie dreams of a finding a ball gown so massive that wedding guests will struggle to get close to her & someone could even "hide" underneath it!

9.title: Did I Hear Someone Say $16,000?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Randy's day is nonstop as he assists brides and auditions models for his runway show. Bride Emanuela wants a sexy ball gown & she's not afraid to throw her dad's budget out the window! Marlena is finally dress shopping for a wedding years in the making.

10.title: That's How You Dress a Lady

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Randy's runway show is finally here! It's his big opportunity to prove he's back as a bridal designer for good. "Gold Rush" star Monica Beets & her colorful family have fun being fish out of water at Kleinfeld. Bride Jaqueline and her mom butt heads.

11.title: Randy's Favorite Celebrity Moments

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Join Randy Fenoli as he looks back on some of his favorite celebrity moments from Say Yes to the Dress! From celebrity brides & entourage members to big star surprises, revisit moments with Joan Rivers, Kelly Ripa, Kathy Griffin, Jillian Michaels & more!
